title: Nigeria denies report it paid 'huge' ransom to free pupils in mass abduction
content: The rebuttal was followed by news the police chief was resigning a year before the end of his term.

title: Ramaphosa thanks Putin for release of South Africans lured into Russia-Ukraine war
content: The men believed they were going to Russia for training as bodyguards but ended up on the front line.

originalTitle: Ghana drops coup leader's name from main airport on putsch anniversary
title: Ghana drops coup leader's name from main airport on putsch anniversary
content: Supporters of the move said the Kotoka name contradicted the country’s democratic values.

originalTitle: Yemen’s ‘Mogadishu’: Somali refugees face poverty, instability in Aden
title: Yemen’s ‘Mogadishu’: Somali refugees face poverty, instability in Aden
content: Generations of refugees in Aden endure poverty, lack identity, and cling to fading memories of Somalia's distant shores.

originalTitle: Ex-UK ambassador Peter Mandelson arrested over alleged Epstein links
title: Ex-UK ambassador Peter Mandelson arrested over alleged Epstein links
content: Ex-UK ambassador to the US Peter Mandelson was arrested for alleged misconduct tied to sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.

originalTitle: Familiar moments mark four years of Russia’s war on Ukraine
title: Familiar moments mark four years of Russia’s war on Ukraine
content: Shows of solidarity and moments of mourning marked yet another anniversary of Russia’s war on Ukraine.

originalTitle: Russian soldiers tell BBC they saw fellow troops executed on commanders' orders
title: Russian soldiers tell BBC they saw fellow troops executed on commanders' orders
content: Four men expose the horror and brutality of conditions in the Ukraine war, with two saying they saw soldiers being shot for refusing orders.

originalTitle: Ukraine remembers its dead as war enters a fifth year
title: Ukraine remembers its dead as war enters a fifth year
content: Events were held across Ukraine to mark four years since Russia launched its full-scale invasion.

originalTitle: Mexico hunts 23 inmates sprung from jail during wave of violence
title: Mexico hunts 23 inmates sprung from jail during wave of violence
content: The prisoners escaped from a jail in Puerto Vallarta after armed men rammed one of the gates.

originalTitle: Prestianni trains at Bernabeu despite match ban over racism allegation
title: Prestianni trains at Bernabeu despite match ban over racism allegation
content: Benfica winger Gianluca Prestianni trained alongside his team-mates at Real Madrid's stadium on Wednesday, despite being provisionally banned for Wednesday's Champions League match between the sides.

originalTitle: 'It would be catastrophic' - are Spurs too big to go down?
title: 'It would be catastrophic' - are Spurs too big to go down?
content: Tottenham's heavy north London derby defeat against Arsenal on Sunday just confirmed what everyone already knew - Igor Tudor's team are in serious trouble. BBC Sport assesses their precarious situation, what relegation might bring and asks if they are too big to go down?

originalTitle: Williamson 'wouldn't rule out' striking over scheduling
title: Williamson 'wouldn't rule out' striking over scheduling
content: England captain Leah Williamson says she would "never rule out" strike action to get players' messaging across to governing bodies about schedule concerns.
